name: CT6122 Personal Portfolio - Blood Forge Animation
name_original: CT6122 Personal Portfolio - Blood Forge Animation
description:
This is my CT6122 - Personal portfolio submission, where I created a real-time animation of a blood sword being forged in Unreal Engine 5. Utilising Blender 3D, Substance Painter, Photoshop, Illustrator and of course, Unreal Engine 5.

Constrictive criticism,  critiques and thoughts are massively welcomed!
